scenes.background: [Bob] and [Monica] are trying to troubleshoot the issue in the office while you remain on your video call from home.
scenes.description: 'We've revisited the steps, but still can’t figure it out. Can you just handle this part?'

options.text: Alright, I'll handle it this time. Let's make sure it doesn't happen again.
options.analysis: You take charge of the situation, showing strong empathy and social skills, but your self-regulation suffers as you compromise your leave.

options.text: I believe you can handle it if you take your time and think it through.
options.analysis: You encourage self-reliance and demonstrate strong self-regulation, but your empathy and motivation to directly assist are lower.

options.text: I’m on leave, but let's quickly go over it one more time together.
options.analysis: You offer a balanced approach, willing to assist while maintaining some boundaries, showing good empathy and social skills.
